inline.description:
Words that trigger mentions - Deselect username
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Click the hamburger main menu
  2. Select "Account Settings" then select "Notifications"
  3. Click "Edit" to the right of "Words that trigger mentions"
  4. De-select "Your non-case sensitive username"
  5. Click "Save"
  6. Use another account to post a message containing your username without the @
inline.expectedResult: • Username does not highlight, and mention is not triggered

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Unscheduled - backlog) Notifications(Edge): After turning off "Words that trigger mentions - Deselect username" - desktop notification still received — MM-23894
